body: 这种故事只有弟弟TS才是正确
这剧情属实有意思了。没想到还有第二话，好期待下一话啊。
草啊，这不就是“主人的任务罢了”吗
怎麼弟弟不直接把哥哥上了呢?由弟弟你來給哥哥幸(性)福阿
有弟弟真好，有吃剩的總比沒得吃好。更何況這基本上算是弟弟餵給哥哥吃了吧

When Kakeru told Kasumi that he was ending their relationship, she basically begged him not to do so and said the magic words "I'll do anything that you want" (then he said that he was "testing" her and that they would still be together). Then, he proceeded to "train" her and finally introduced her to his brother.

Poor brother and poor Kasumi. The blond (Kakeru) is fucking insane. At first I thought that the blond guy was the type of character that was set on destroying his brother after feeling humiliated by something his brother did in the past or for feeling inferior to the brother. However, it seems that he had a twisted desire to fulfill his brother's wishes, among them, marrying a girl like Kasumi (and that's why he was fucking the gyaru as well, because the brother said before that he liked gyarus). He basically wooed then sexually and emotionally abused ("trained") Kasumi, after he threatened her with dumping her when she had become emotionally attached to him (pretending to be lovers), into accepting that her happiness was to feel needed by the blond (even after she came to realize that she didn't love him). After that, he introduced Kasumi to his brother. Or that's what I got after reading Kasumi's part.
這部也太jb炫酷了啊

Wow, now this is dark. Very well-thought-out. If the end of the sequel didn't have his brother it would have completely turned into typical vanilla, But with this prequel being released just add so much depth into the story. I'm impressed. Very excited for another sequel though it's very likely to become nasty.
Nice job translating patriot, that blonde bro is just a yandere bro-con.
畫風很讚，但尻不起來啊
And you can tie what I said if you go to the comments of the other chapter.

Someone said that this is actually the prequel. Older brother sacrificed a lot of things in his youth because of taking care of his brother since their mother died very young, so older brother didn't have time for a romance. Younger bro wants to repay him by getting a girl and training her to be a perfect wife for his older brother. So what you're seeing is the prequel and the other chapter is the sequel to this when the girl is married with the older bro. Or at least that's what someone said.
补充了上一话之前的剧情，怎么说呢...未曾设想的道路，挺新颖的
@zombieadd Did you read it alredy somewhere? Plz do rub some salt here with a rough summary I don wanna wait to know this, get conflicted again and move on. Faster the better
雖然沒寫2，但這算是第2話吧

This is part 2 ("chuuhen" roughly means "middle part"), here is part 1: https://nhentai.net/g/349166/ I wish this series gets english TL'd. And I'm already giving a heads up to the weak-hearted fellas, I guarantee you this isn't gonna end well when part 3 comes (either Comic ExE 32 or 33), so yea.
沃日，这什么鬼剧情，好几把酷炫
Why don't you just fuck your brother?
I despise ntr but if you like, you like. Just really wanna know the dialog of the last 2 pages to confirm if she fell or whatever but in the end it'll only get me salty lol

From what I can tel from the imagesl, the second girl is married since it looks like she got a ring and the part where it seems she gets a call or something like that, then the boy gets her drunk and ntr. This implies that the first girl might be on the same boat. The third one there is a part that seems to be missing where the childhood friend (black haired guy) confess his feelings and they both fuck etc, seems to be after the blond fucks her tho. After they confirm their feelings they sleep and the blondie appears with handcuffs and it goes with the ntr.
某未来嫂子.....
